feed.title: Category: Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance (GBA, 2002)
entry.content: This is the second GBA Metroid style Castlevania game. I played it on the plane to and from a conference. It was very fun. There are few points where the game is really confusing because there is basically no direction about what you're supposed to do and how an item you got is actually a key. It was frustrating to spend hours wandering around looking for something that I could do that I hadn't done, but I learned the map really well as a result.
